name: WGMI
description: The ultimate community takeover. We're Gonna Make It. Rebuilt from the ashes, we're an inclusive Web3 community that gives back. We exist to make Web3 accessible to all. Weâ€™re bridging the gap between the meta and physical worlds through education, challenges, rewards and social impact in a flowing circular ecosystem. Education: The WGMI Web3 Academy - the safest place to learn how to invest in crypto. Daily DeFi classes on TikTok, creating a step-by-step guide for the new investor. Participation & Rewards: We've built a rewards smart contract where we can seamlessly allocate prizes and rewards to our holders, through the WGMI dashboard. We are creating an ecosystem where you can give back to our community-led social impact causes just by being involved. Vibes: a supportive culture, a safe space to learn, have fun, connect with others and vibe! Everyone is welcome. We're Gonna Make It!
